extracted_playbook.title: Apply AMD's Available Mitigations
extracted_playbook.description: Implement the mitigations provided by AMD to address the vulnerabilities in the affected products.

affected_products: Ryzen Embedded V1000, V2000, and V3000
Ryzen 3000 Mobile, 5000 Mobile, 4000 Mobile, and 7000 Mobile series
AMD Threadripper PRO (Castle Peak WS SP3, Chagall WS)
